pkgmetadata.longdescription: scicast is a python utility that automates many of the repetitive steps of analyzing single cell sequencing data.-k-means clustering to identify clusters-Clustering and subclustering of data to identify 'stable' sets of cells.-Statistical testing to identify top genes that indentify stable cluster.-Correlation search and analysis to identify gene networks driving cluster identity.-Outputs both plots for visualization (PCA and heatmap) cell and gene lists that can be used to refine analysis.
